KnowledgeItem.Title: SupervisorStopProgramWorkflow
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for handling packages related to Stop a Program running via supervisor and adding a program by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock SupervisorStopProgramWorkflow and the necessary information for successful completion of workflow.

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${SSPW:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${SSPW:User}
				Command='cd /etc/supervisor/conf.d && sudo supervisorctl stop ${SSPW:Program}'
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				Host=${SSPW:Host}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> 
				</NewBlock>
